video.title: Popples
video.synopsis: The adorable Best Popple Pals love helping their friends and neighbors, but every time they do it seems to backfire in hilarious ways.

episodes.synopsis: Oops! Lulu's science fair invention locks the pals inside the Treepod; Friends try everything to cure Sunny's cold so she can play in the big game.
episodes.title: Smart House Arrest / Sunny Loses Her Pop

episodes.synopsis: The whole town thinks Yikes is a genius after Lulu switches tests with him; Yikes and Mike Mine face a big challenge on Palentine's Day.
episodes.title: It Doesn't Take a Genius / Palentine's Day

episodes.synopsis: Lulu's robot goes haywire and tries to "help" everyone in town; Sunny tricks her friends into thinking a scary beast is headed for Popplopolis.
episodes.title: Help-R Hinder / The Legend of Popfoot

episodes.synopsis: With their clubhouse at stake, the pals hunt for a lost treasure; Bubbles finds a way to be in two places at once, but her double makes trouble.
episodes.title: Win a Free Tree House / Bubbles Double's

episodes.synopsis: Mike Mine tries to turn two pals against each other in the race for class president; Bubbles realizes a "BFF" app can't replace her friends.
episodes.title: Student Buddy President / The BFF App

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Snooply's plan to punish the pals for their wild antics backfires; Sunny tries to travel back in time to get her hands on a hot new video game.
episodes.title: Fame & Misfortune / A Do Do Do Do-Over

episodes.synopsis: Izzy sets out to find a famous pirate treasure, only to discover it's cursed; The pals enter a quiz contest to make up for embarrassing Miss Shush.
episodes.title: The Curse of Popple Pete the Pirate / Teacher of the Year

episodes.synopsis: Miss Shush tries to stop the pals' rowdy behavior with a book of outdated laws; Sunny faces a dilemma when a clumsy Bubbles joins the poppleball team.
episodes.title: Pop in the Name of the Law / At the Pop of Her Game

episodes.synopsis: A bored Izzy convinces the pals to fly to space, but their adventure takes a spooky turn; Izzy's field trip into secret tunnels doesn't go as planned.
episodes.title: Izzy Lost In Space / Pop-Tivity Week

episodes.synopsis: As the pals prepare for the big Cupid dance, Bubbles tries to play matchmaker; Lulu invents a new drink that takes the town by storm.
episodes.title: Popposites Attract / Lulu's Poplooloo Juice

episodes.synopsis: The pals help a frantic Lulu prepare to give a speech at the Inventors' Society; When the mayor loses his memory, Bubbles steps in to run the city.
episodes.title: S-Pop-Eech / Mayor Bubbles

episodes.synopsis: A flying robot suit turns Sunny into a superhero, but the power soon goes to her head; Sharing a pod puts Bubbles and Sunny's friendship to the test.
episodes.title: Maid of Steel / Pop-Tervention

episodes.synopsis: When Bubbles can't get her pals to join in a singalong, she resorts to sneaky tactics; Lulu's new invention leaves the Popples acting like zombies.
episodes.title: To Err is Popple / Dawn of the Dull

episodes.synopsis: The pals find a creative way to teach Izzy a new dance; Lulu programs Help-R to help her friends with their work, but the robot has bigger plans.
episodes.title: Pop n Hop Til You Drop / Stop the Robo Pop

episodes.synopsis: Bubbles learns the hard way that her idol is a selfish diva; Mrs. Snooply moves into the treehouse for a few days and makes some big changes.
episodes.title: Fallen Pop Idol / Bubble Trouble
